TEXT.BibTeX_citation: @misc{Wiki_szy_Kaliyawan, title = Kaliyawan, year = 2025, month = May, day = 5, note = {In Wikipedia [Sakizaya]}, url = {https://szy.wikipedia.org/wiki/Kaliyawan} }

S.FORM: == Kaliyawan == u zuma a kamu nu Hulam: u siwkay nu niyazu' i Hualien a kuwan nu Kalinku ku niyazu' nu Kaliyawan. u kasalumaluma' nu Kaliyawan sa, 1,751 ku luma'. kumud nu kasabinawlan sa, 4,493 ku tademawan. kasabinawlan nu Ingcumin sa, 1,266 ku tademaw, pakalatu 28%. u zuma sa, cay ku Ingcumin, 3,227 ku tademaw, pakalatu 72%. u sausi nu cidekay a tademaw u kasabinacadan, Pangcah(Amis) 15%, Yuwatan(Bunun) 2%, Tayan(Tayal) 2%, Taluku(Truku) 6%, Kebalan(Kevalan) 2%, Paywan(Paiwan) 1%, zumazuma 1%. u tademaw nu Kabalan, u ziyazu' nu Kabalan i tiza i Sinchen. u Sakizaya a tademaw izawtu ku Sakizaya itini mueneng, caykatuud ku Sakizaya, uzuma a tademaw sa u Taluku Tayan atu Yuwatan, katuud ku Hulalm intini mueneng. u cidekay nu Taywan Yincumin u siwkay nu Yincumin u Yincumin sananay, u saayaway a muenengay a tademaw itini, itini uyiniyan a subal. u sasubana'ay a kamu sa, Taywan Yincumin sa mikitinay "Timul Subal kamu cidekay " saan. u niyazu' sa, u luyaluy nu tademaw, pulung muengeneng, u kabana' kami, hina u lalumaay amin i niyazu', caay kayadah ku ihekalay a tademaw. silecaday a lalangawan, lisin, kamu, atu kabanaan. si kalilidan(Tumuk) saca babalaki mililid tu niyazu'. i Taywan Yincumin, izaw ku 16 cidekay puluung sa 748 a niyazu', maka 55 a mang a tademaw. satabakiaya a cidekay ku Pangcah(Amis), saadidi'ay a cidekay ku Laaluwa. u tabakiaya a niyazu' sa, ku Tapalong, u niyazu' nu Pangcah(Amis). tademaw nu Yincumin, pulung sausi katukuh 2017 a mihcan 12 a bulad tademaw nu Yincumin, pulung sausi katukuh 2018 a mihcan 4 a bulad pulung sausi (561,327), Pangcah (209,430), Tayan (90,059), Paywan (100,689), Yuwatan (58,390), Rukay (13,314), Puyuma (14,140), Cou (6,635), Saysiat (6,607), Yami (4,606), Saw (785), Kabalan (1,465), Taluku (31,501), Sakizaya (929), Sejek (9,992), Laaluwa (399), Kanakanabu (334), zuma (12,052) namakayniay a nasulitan nasakamuan atu natinengan ː malaalitin tu i hekalay atu zumaay a natinengan ː Paykanatalay a pu Lumaluma'an a se kitakit kalunasulitan atu palatuh calay-zazan Yuancumincu weyuanhuy kitakit nalunasulitan atu palatuh calay-zazan pulung sausi nalunasulitan

== Kaliyawan == o zoma a kamo no Holam: o siwkay no niyazo' i Hoalien a kowan no Kalinko ko niyazo' no Kaliyawan. o kasalomaloma' no Kaliyawan sa, 1,751 ko loma'. komod no kasabinawlan sa, 4,493 ko tademawan. kasabinawlan no Ingcomin sa, 1,266 ko tademaw, pakalato 28%. o zoma sa, cay ko Ingcomin, 3,227 ko tademaw, pakalato 72%. o saosi no cidekay a tademaw o kasabinacadan, Pangcah(Amis) 15%, Yowatan(Bonon) 2%, Tayan(Tayal) 2%, Taloko(Troko) 6%, Kebalan(Kevalan) 2%, Paywan(Paiwan) 1%, zomazoma 1%. o tademaw no Kabalan, o ziyazo' no Kabalan i tiza i Sinchen. o Sakizaya a tademaw izawto ko Sakizaya itini moeneng, caykatood ko Sakizaya, ozoma a tademaw sa o Taloko Tayan ato Yowatan, katood ko Holalm intini moeneng. o cidekay no Taywan Yincomin o siwkay no Yincomin o Yincomin sananay, o saayaway a moenengay a tademaw itini, itini oyiniyan a sobal. o sasobana'ay a kamo sa, Taywan Yincomin sa mikitinay "Timol Sobal kamo cidekay " saan. o niyazo' sa, o loyaloy no tademaw, polong moengeneng, o kabana' kami, hina o lalomaay amin i niyazo', caay kayadah ko ihekalay a tademaw. silecaday a lalangawan, lisin, kamo, ato kabanaan. si kalilidan(Tomok) saca babalaki mililid to niyazo'. i Taywan Yincomin, izaw ko 16 cidekay poloong sa 748 a niyazo', maka 55 a mang a tademaw. satabakiaya a cidekay ko Pangcah(Amis), saadidi'ay a cidekay ko Laalowa. o tabakiaya a niyazo' sa, ko Tapalong, o niyazo' no Pangcah(Amis). tademaw no Yincomin, polong saosi katokoh 2017 a mihcan 12 a bolad tademaw no Yincomin, polong saosi katokoh 2018 a mihcan 4 a bolad polong saosi (561,327), Pangcah (209,430), Tayan (90,059), Paywan (100,689), Yowatan (58,390), Rokay (13,314), Poyoma (14,140), Coo (6,635), Saysiat (6,607), Yami (4,606), Saw (785), Kabalan (1,465), Taloko (31,501), Sakizaya (929), Sejek (9,992), Laalowa (399), Kanakanabo (334), zoma (12,052) namakayniay a nasolitan nasakamoan ato natinengan ː malaalitin to i hekalay ato zomaay a natinengan ː Paykanatalay a po Lomaloma'an a se kitakit kalonasolitan ato palatoh calay-zazan Yoancominco weyoanhoy kitakit nalonasolitan ato palatoh calay-zazan polong saosi nalonasolitan
